summary:
Adds \"The Fin Gleam\" to the game. It is located at Evergreen Grove, south of Half-moon Mills.
The helm where originally an item in TES IV: Oblivion, In this version the helm provides water breathing as well as nightsight to it\'s wearer. It also provides a greater power that lets the user exchange stamina for 30 seconds of detect life.
descriptionHtml:
The Fin Gleam          (v 1.0)
-------------------------------------------------------
Created by: Vindar
A.K.A. _Rahvin_ on the Nexus

Check out my other mods:
Axe of the Beastmaster - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21928/
Gauntlets of Gluttonous Power - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21813/
Boots of Blinding Speed - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21735/
Eleidon\'s Ward - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22268/
Helm of Oreyn Bearclaw - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23003/
Don\'t forget to endorse if you like the mod :)

Vindar\'s Value Pack, now located on the Nexus: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25122/

Features:
-----------
Adds \"The Fin Gleam\" to the game. It is located at Evergreen Grove,
south of Half-moon Mills.

The helm where originally an item in TES IV: Oblivion, In this version
the helm provides water breathing as well as nightsight to it\'s wearer.
It also provides a greater power that lets the user exchange stamina for
30 seconds of detect life.


Additem Codes: 
The Fin Gleam - xx00012c4

(consistantly on my machine, your\'s may vary) 
(\"xx\" is the load order of the mod)



If code doesn\'t work, use: 
                    help \"The Fin Gleam\"

\"The Fin Gleam\" can be upgraded at a workbench using:
                   1 Ebony Ingot
                   1 Malachite Ingot


Installation:
--------------
Copy the files to your: 

                     Skyrim/Data 

folder, The folders will merge with any existing folders, if not it 
will create a new one. 

Once this is done activate the: 

              The Fin Gleam.esp

Via your prefered method, NMM, Wyre, or the default Skyrim launcher. 
from here you should be all set to go.



Compatibility:
----------------
This mod should be compatible with just about any other mod out there, 
all things added used unique ID\'s and did not touch any leveled lists. 
If their are compatibility issues, let me know.


Bugs:
-------
Considering the simple nature of this mod, their are no 
known bugs, If you do encounter one, let me know and 
I\'ll do my best to fix it, but please be nice.


Changelog:
--------------
(v 1.0) Initial release


Usage:
--------
Contact me if you intend to use my mod in anything you 
intend to publish, I did create it, I want a say where it 
goes and what is done to it. Personal use modification 
is ok, but anything public, please contact me.


Thanks to \"Aperture Science Potato Device\" who requested this Mod.
author: Vindar
